author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: اين عبد را فائز فرمائى بآنچه سبب نجات است در جميع عوالم تو، توئى مقتدر و توانا و توئى عالم و دانا.
translation: Suffer this servant, I beseech Thee, to attain unto that which is the cause of his salvation in every world of Thy worlds. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise
